name: CyberCrime
description: CÂ² tracking and malware database.

name: Dataset of Packed ELF
description: Dataset of packed ELF samples.

name: Dataset of Packed PE
description: Sanitized version of the original dataset, PackingData, removing packed samples from the Notpacked folder but also samples in packer folders that failed to be packed (having a same hash as the original unpacked executable).

name: Ember
description: Collection of features from PE files that serve as a benchmark dataset for researchers.

name: FFRI Dataset Scripts
description: Make datasets like FFRI Dataset.

name: MaleX
description: Curated dataset of malware and benign Windows executable samples for malware researchers containing 1,044,394 Windows executable binaries and corresponding image representations with 864,669 labelled as malware and 179,725 as benign.

name: Malfease
description: Dataset of about 5,000 packed malware samples.

name: Malheur
description: Contains the recorded behavior of malicious software (malware) and has been used for developing methods for classifying and clustering malware behavior (see the JCS article from 2011).

name: Malicia
description: Dataset of 11,688 malicous PE files collected from 500 drive-by download servers over a period of 11 months in 2013 (DISCONTINUED).

name: MalShare
description: Free Malware repository providing researchers access to samples, malicious feeds, and Yara results.

name: MalwareBazaar
description: Project operated by abuse.ch aimed to collect and share malware samples, helping IT-security researchers and threat analysts protecting their constituency and customers from cyber threats.

name: MalwareGallery
description: Yet another malware collection in the Internet.

name: OARC Malware Dataset
description: Semi-public dataset of 3,467 samples captured in the wild from Sep 2005 to Jan 2006 by mail traps, user submissions, honeypots and other sources aggregated by the OARC, available to qualified academic and industry researchers upon request.

name: Open Malware
description: Online collection of malware samples.

name: PackingData
description: Original dataset with sample PE files packed with a large variety of packers, including ASPack, BeRoEXEPacker, exe32pack, eXpressor, FSG, JDPack, MEW, Molebox, MPRESS, Neolite, NSPack, Pckman, PECompact, PEtite, RLPack, UPX, WinUpack, Yoda's Crypter and Yoda's Protector.

name: Packware
description: Datasets and codes that are needed to reproduce the experiments in the paper "When Malware is Packing Heat".

name: RCE Lab
description: Crackme's, keygenme's, serialme's ; the "tuts4you" folder contains many packed binaries.

name: Runtime Packers Testset
description: Dataset of 10 common Malware files, packed with about 40 different runtime packers in over 500 versions and options, with a total of about 5,000 samples.

name: SOREL
description: Sophos-ReversingLabs 20 Million dataset.

name: theZoo
description: Project created to make the possibility of malware analysis open and available to the public.

name: ViruSign
description: Another online malware database.

name: VirusShare
description: Virus online database with more thant 44 millions of samples.

name: VX Heaven
description: Site dedicated to providing information about computer viruses.

name: VX Underground

name: VXvault

name: WildList

name: Alternate EXE Packer

name: Andromeda

name: APKProtect

name: Armadillo

name: AutoIT
description: Legitimate executable encryption service.

name: BangCle
